name: Global Anthro Notes Project
body:
### Welcome to the Global Anthro Notes Project
[Paratext Anthro Note Google Sheet (SIL-only)](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qk3G-uDbEQUER4-ojHVxw9AQVH2RYIkL4ILng5graP0/edit#gid=1428504785&vpid=C2)

Paratext 7.6 Beta 4 and experimental SPUD Setup:

1. Download and Install [7.6 Beta 4 base installation](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxKtjmBey1gkcDRKNWowYjVyOW8) (If you haven't already done so.)
1. Download & Double-Click Latest SPUD: [ptwAnthroNotes7.6.54.506.SPUD (@ 7.6.54.80)](http://update.ubs-icap.org/DeveloperUseOnly/ptwAnthroNotes7.6.54.506.SPUD)

Paratext Anthro Notes (GAN):

1. [View in HTML (English)] (notes/en) | Download latest [English GAN zip](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxKtjmBey1gkOWw1UDM0eHpIWWs).
1. [View in HTML (French)] (notes/fr) | Download latest [French GANfr zip](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxKtjmBey1gkUUpwazRoSVNicTQ).

Global Anthro Notes Installation:

1. Download Latest GAN zip (select by language above, and click on "Download" icon)
1. Extract to your "My Paratext Projects" folder. (e.g. My Paratext Projects\GANfr.ssf, My Paratext Projects\GANfr\ )
If the language .LDS file already exists, you can skip replacing that file.
1. In Paratext, File > Open File/Resource... to a scripture project or resource
1. View > Show Consultant Notes > GAN (Global Anthro Notes)
1. Navigate to Luke 1:1 in the scripture project or resource

[LCO to OCM](lco-ocm/)

[ANQR wiki](https://www.wiki.insitehome.org/display/IntlAnthro/ANQR+Resource+Library)

### Authors and Contributors
Eric Pyle (@ericpyle)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
